page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: Recreation available in the Stanford area includes a youth club, which is attached to Hassenbrook School. Some of the activities available are: discos, weight-training, O & A level studies. The Warren is a popular fishing lake for adults and children. The fish which can be caught include rud, carp and eels. There are two lakes, a larger and a smaller. Stanford also has a playing field, called "The Rec". Facilities include pitches for cricket, football, rugby bowls and tennis. There is also a social club, a childrens' play-area, a crazy golf course and a netball area. These facilities provide many hours of fun for people of all ages.
